name: Sound Maze
description:
It is an atmospheric, minimalistic sound maze. The maze is formed of fake and real hidden tiles. Tile reveals itself after the player steps on them. The game leads the player with various sounds, to figure out what is real and what is fake.

It is done for GlobalGameJam 2021

Credits: 

miniR - sound design

Finn - music composer

Sarunas Ramonas SARRAM- game development, 3D
